original_text: It is bad for you to eat too much honey. If you always want people to praise you, it is also bad for you.
korean_text: 꿀을 많이 먹는 것이 좋지 못하고 자기의 영예를 구하는 것이 헛되니라

sentences.original_text: It is bad for you to eat too much honey
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게 꿀을 너무 많이 먹는 것은 나쁘다

sentences.original_text: If you always want people to praise you
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너가 항상 사람들에게 칭찬받기를 원한다면

sentences.original_text: it is also bad for you
